name: Poker Combinatorics+  Count Combos & Blockers
description: Combinatorics+ is the only app you need to upskill your poker knowledge on hand reading. The app is extremely fast and easy to use poker calculator. Just enter a preflop range, board and/or dead cards to easily figure out how a range hits a board.  Once you developed your intuition, test your knowledge using the training module to hone your hand reading skills.   All combinations supported including high card, pairs, two pairs, sets, straight, flush, full house, quads, straight flush and royal flush. In addition to this, you can also able to see various draws including gutshots, open ended straight draws and flush draws.  Just change the ranges and board, the app will instantly compute and show all your hand combinations including percentages!  If you have any feedback or questions, please contact us at info@craftywheel.com. Dont miss out this free app to improve your poker game today. Download now!
